sdf:title: OMA LwM2M Power Control (Object ID 3312)
title: Power Control
description: This Object is used to control a power source, such as a Smart Plug.  It allows a power relay to be turned on or off and its dimmer setting to be control as a % between 0 and 100.

On_Off.title: On/Off
On_Off.description: On/off control. Boolean value where True is On and False is Off.

Dimmer.title: Dimmer
Dimmer.description: This resource represents a dimmer setting, which has an Integer value between 0 and 100 as a percentage.

On_time.title: On time
On_time.description: The time in seconds that the device has been on. Writing a value of 0 resets the counter.

Cumulative_active_power.title: Cumulative active power
Cumulative_active_power.description: The cumulative active power since the last cumulative energy reset or device start.

Power_factor.title: Power factor
Power_factor.description: If applicable, the power factor of the current consumption.

Application_Type.title: Application Type
Application_Type.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.

Timestamp.title: Timestamp
Timestamp.description: The timestamp of when the measurement was performed.

Fractional_Timestamp.title: Fractional Timestamp
Fractional_Timestamp.description: Fractional part of the timestamp when sub-second precision is used (e.g., 0.23 for 230 ms).
